problem_text_cn: 如图所示,河堤横断面迎水坡AB的坡比是1:2,坡高BC=5m,则坡面AB的长度()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the slope ratio of the water-facing slope AB of the cross section of the river embankment is N_0:N_1, and the slope height BC = N_2, then the length of the slope AB ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了解直角三角形的应用,解答本题的关键是根据坡比构造直角三角形,利用三角函数的知识求解．
